Name: Colortone
About the game: You’ve been caught into trap and now you must get out of it. You don’t have any super capacity with exception to your own brain. You can only pass the room with the help of your brain, because you will have to solve the puzzle in order to open an exit. And remember - the puzzles get ever more complicated in the course of a game. Game features: Brain upgrade at every level Unusual puzzles Trade maps
